PURPOSE: suite of security-related network utilities based on the ssh
FUSE-based filesystem client for mounting remote directories
X compositor that may fix tearing issues
window action utilities on the command line (maim)
turns on NumLock when you login
image viewer that also sets the wallpaper
can take quick screenshots at your request
used by i3blocks to display what keyboard layout
library for storing and retrieving passwords and other secrets
audio interface for pulseaudio and ALSA
takes care of the user's security credentials
